scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && npx workbox generateSW workbox-config.js && echo flights.shuchir.dev >> www/CNAME
scripts.build-cordova: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && cd cordova && cordova build
scripts.build-cordova-ios: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && cd cordova && cordova build ios
scripts.cordova-ios: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && cd cordova && cordova emulate ios --target iPhone-15
scripts.build-cordova-android: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && cd cordova && cordova build android
scripts.cordova-android: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && node ./build/build-cordova.js && cd cordova && cordova run android
